director.name: 安东尼奥·雷斯 António Reis

introduction: Realização: António ReisProdutora: Câmara Municipal do PortoProdução: César Guerra LealMade by commission of the Porto City Council, Panels of the Porto is a visual essay on the city, gathering sequences filmed between the river and downtown, commented with the reading of poems by authors like Vasco de Lima Couto, Egito Gonçalves, Rosália de Castro, Pedro Homem de Mello, Fernando Pessoa, and António Reis himself, with music by Francisco Rebelo.
